main.title: Effortless Invocing and Management for Growing Businesses
main.subtitle: Boost your business efficiency with a centralized platform designed for small and medium enterprises. Automate invoicing, client management, employee tracking and product inventory.

aboutData.title: Your workflow, Simplified in Charts
aboutData.chartDescription: Showing data for products and sales in the last 3 months

section.generateText: Create professional invoices with a few clicks. Our intuitive interface makes invoice generation a breeze.
section.productText: Organize, edit and add products with ease. Keep track of your financial documents in one place.
section.trackingText: Monitor payment status and send reminder automatically. Stay on top of your cash flow with powerful tracking tools.
